Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: AI gave more general and broad feedback, but could tell me specific places to improve when prompted. My tutor gave specific feedback, but also was vague about where and how to improve.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Feedback from my tutor made me feel more confident because it was from a real person
